name: part_021
file: tmp_【5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY】The Story Thus Far - featuring HoloEN! #5YearsOfMori [MryxToVvJO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_021.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope reflects on memories in a surreal VRChat environment before announcing her anniversary merchandise.
Mori Calliope presents a commercial for her 5th Anniversary merchandise set.

subtitles.original: Hey there Dead Beats.
subtitles.english: Hey there Dead Beats.

subtitles.original: Hey there. It's me.
subtitles.english: Hey there. It's me.

subtitles.original: It's okay to be sad.
subtitles.english: It's okay to be sad.

subtitles.original: It's okay to miss the people
subtitles.english: It's okay to miss the people

subtitles.original: who changed our lives if they aren't here anymore.
subtitles.english: who changed our lives if they aren't here anymore.

subtitles.original: I think... it's okay.
subtitles.english: I think... it's okay.

subtitles.original: But as long as we have memories, right?
subtitles.english: But as long as we have memories, right?

subtitles.original: Um... then I think maybe...
subtitles.english: Um... then I think maybe...

subtitles.original: just maybe, it'll be okay
subtitles.english: just maybe, it'll be okay

subtitles.original: even if we never truly move on.
subtitles.english: even if we never truly move on.

subtitles.original: Well, I'm happy that we have memories, right?
subtitles.english: Well, I'm happy that we have memories, right?

subtitles.original:
And to never, never forget all the stuff
that we did together.
subtitles.english:
And to never, never forget all the stuff
that we did together.

subtitles.original:
Cuz we did some really amazing stuff,
don't you guys think?
subtitles.english:
Cuz we did some really amazing stuff,
don't you guys think?

subtitles.original: I think we did.
subtitles.english: I think we did.

subtitles.original: And I don't want to forget any of that,
subtitles.english: And I don't want to forget any of that,

subtitles.original:
cuz like I said, I don't really have any plans
to get going anytime soon.
subtitles.english:
cuz like I said, I don't really have any plans
to get going anytime soon.

subtitles.original: But I guess the way that I feel about it is...
subtitles.english: But I guess the way that I feel about it is...

subtitles.original: I'd like to keep remembering all those people
subtitles.english: I'd like to keep remembering all those people

subtitles.original:
and things that we did fondly,
regardless of anything.
subtitles.english:
and things that we did fondly,
regardless of anything.

subtitles.original:
Even through the years,
and though they may pass by,
subtitles.english:
Even through the years,
and though they may pass by,

subtitles.original: and even when the wounds aren't fresh anymore...
subtitles.english: and even when the wounds aren't fresh anymore...

subtitles.original: I still... I still want to remember.
subtitles.english: I still... I still want to remember.

subtitles.original: I know it's hard to... it's hard to move forward
subtitles.english: I know it's hard to... it's hard to move forward

subtitles.original:
sometimes when the things that we love
and care about are still behind us, right?
subtitles.english:
sometimes when the things that we love
and care about are still behind us, right?

subtitles.original: And stuck in the past.
subtitles.english: And stuck in the past.

subtitles.original:
But I'm gonna be here to make you smile
no matter what right now,
subtitles.english:
But I'm gonna be here to make you smile
no matter what right now,

subtitles.original: 'cause there's still stuff I want to do, you know?
subtitles.english: 'cause there's still stuff I want to do, you know?

subtitles.original:
And yeah, that's a good point,
that good memories,
subtitles.english:
And yeah, that's a good point,
that good memories,

subtitles.original:
they should make you sad because...
because that means they were truly good.
subtitles.english:
they should make you sad because...
because that means they were truly good.

subtitles.original:
We did a lot of really good stuff,
you guys think?
subtitles.english:
We did a lot of really good stuff,
you guys think?

subtitles.original: Well, I'm glad that I sang that here with Ina.
subtitles.english: Well, I'm glad that I sang that here with Ina.

subtitles.original: I'm really glad.
subtitles.english: I'm really glad.

subtitles.original:
But there's still some people
that I haven't sung with,
subtitles.english:
But there's still some people
that I haven't sung with,

subtitles.original: so let's head to the final area, shall we?
subtitles.english: so let's head to the final area, shall we?

subtitles.original: What if I just, bam, teleported myself there
subtitles.english: What if I just, bam, teleported myself there

subtitles.original:
and used my crazy powers of...
Oh, my waist is broken.
subtitles.english:
and used my crazy powers of...
Oh, my waist is broken.

subtitles.original: That's okay. No, it's fine. All good, all good.
subtitles.english: That's okay. No, it's fine. All good, all good.

subtitles.original: I probably just need to T-pose real quick.
subtitles.english: I probably just need to T-pose real quick.

subtitles.original: Hang on, watch this. Watch my sick T-pose.
subtitles.english: Hang on, watch this. Watch my sick T-pose.

subtitles.original: Hang on. I'm already good at this.
subtitles.english: Hang on. I'm already good at this.

subtitles.original:
I've become a pro at VRChat
in just this short time.
subtitles.english:
I've become a pro at VRChat
in just this short time.

subtitles.original: There we go. Fixed. All right.
subtitles.english: There we go. Fixed. All right.

subtitles.original:
Time to summon my persona
and head to the final area!
subtitles.english:
Time to summon my persona
and head to the final area!

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh, we're here. We're here.
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh, we're here. We're here.

subtitles.original: Oh, where'd my camera go? I lost it!
subtitles.english: Oh, where'd my camera go? I lost it!

subtitles.original: Is it hiding somewhere? Is it behind me?
subtitles.english: Is it hiding somewhere? Is it behind me?

subtitles.original: Oh, I found it. There you are.
subtitles.english: Oh, I found it. There you are.

subtitles.original: Found you!
subtitles.english: Found you!

subtitles.original: Um, this is one of my favorite areas, I think.
subtitles.english: Um, this is one of my favorite areas, I think.

subtitles.original: You guys! You guys, look!
subtitles.english: You guys! You guys, look!

subtitles.original: What is this? Green fields?
subtitles.english: What is this? Green fields?

subtitles.original: Oh! There's one of those camera thingies.
subtitles.english: Oh! There's one of those camera thingies.

subtitles.original: Hang on, okay. Uh, check this out.
subtitles.english: Hang on, okay. Uh, check this out.

subtitles.original: Whoa! It's too beautiful!
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's too beautiful!

subtitles.original:
Can you guys imagine hanging out
with your friends here?
subtitles.english:
Can you guys imagine hanging out
with your friends here?

subtitles.original: Wouldn't that be so awesome?
subtitles.english: Wouldn't that be so awesome?

subtitles.original:
I'm running up that hill.
I'm running up the hill.
subtitles.english:
I'm running up that hill.
I'm running up the hill.

subtitles.original: Oh my gosh! Hey! Wait a minute! What's this?
subtitles.english: Oh my gosh! Hey! Wait a minute! What's this?

subtitles.original: Was Ina painting something here?
subtitles.english: Was Ina painting something here?

subtitles.original: I didn't know about that. Heh.
subtitles.english: I didn't know about that. Heh.

subtitles.original:
I mean, it is a really nice scenery
to paint, I suppose.
subtitles.english:
I mean, it is a really nice scenery
to paint, I suppose.

subtitles.original: So I guess it makes sense. I'd want to paint here. Hehe.
subtitles.english: So I guess it makes sense. I'd want to paint here. Hehe.

subtitles.original:
So expansive. Oh, sorry. Hang on...
That's okay, it doesn't matter.
subtitles.english:
So expansive. Oh, sorry. Hang on...
That's okay, it doesn't matter.

subtitles.original: So surreal and tranquil.
subtitles.english: So surreal and tranquil.

subtitles.original:
I guess this is a good place to tell
you guys the news
subtitles.english:
I guess this is a good place to tell

subtitles.original:
about a special thing that gets released
for anniversary, especially.
subtitles.english:
about a special thing that gets released

subtitles.original:
Do you guys know what it is?
Are we going to run the clip?
subtitles.english:
Do you guys know what it is?
Are we going to run the clip?

subtitles.original: I think we're going to run the clip.
subtitles.english: I think we're going to run the clip.

subtitles.original: All right, guys, we have merchandise!
subtitles.english: All right, guys, we have merchandise!

subtitles.original:
So I created a little commercial
before we get to singing here.
subtitles.english:
So I created a little commercial
before we get to singing here.

subtitles.original: Run it, Sapsan!
subtitles.english: Run it, Sapsan!

subtitles.original:
Heh! Minna-san! It's been five long years
together, but we've done it!
subtitles.english:
Heh! Minna-san! It's been five long years
together, but we've done it!

subtitles.original: We made it to year five together!
subtitles.english: We made it to year five together!

And while the future's looking pretty
crazy and eventful,
subtitles.english:
And while the future's looking pretty

let's take a little time to celebrate

let's take a little time to celebrate
